import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; const Home = () => { return (

Welcome to Our Recipe App

Discover new recipes and share your favorites with the world

 Explore Recipes Browse a variety of recipes by category and discover new flavors to try in your kitchen. Create Recipes Share your favorite recipes with the world by creating and submitting your own unique dishes. Join the Community Connect with other food lovers and share your thoughts and ideas about cooking and cuisine.
); }; export default Home;
